sentences.english: The script could be improved by displaying the picks in a Keno-style board.
sentences.chinese: 可以通過在基諾樣式板中顯示選擇結果來改進腳本。

sentences.english: Furniture suits to use take carven Euramerican furniture style.
sentences.chinese: 傢俱適合用帶雕刻的歐美傢俱樣式。

sentences.english: The border styles make it easy to see the results of the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 邊界樣式的使用使查看錦標賽的結果非常容易。

sentences.english: The Congo people decorate their pipes with figural and geometric patterns.
sentences.chinese: 剛果人民用幾和形狀的樣式裝飾他們的菸斗。

sentences.english: In the architecture, the old building like Cosmological temple was built according to the idea of "Round Sky & Square Earth".
sentences.chinese: 在建制上，古代的建築樣式如明堂就擬天圓地方而建。

sentences.english: Design games to work well across multiple screen sizes.
sentences.chinese: 設計能夠跨多樣式屏幕運行的遊戲。

sentences.english: Cannot load the style sheet due to a corrupt style sheet file.
sentences.chinese: 因樣式表文件已損壞而無法加載該樣式表。

sentences.english: Cannot load the style sheet due to a corrupt style sheet file.
sentences.chinese: 因樣式表文件已損壞而無法加載該樣式表。

sentences.english: It applies an XSLT style sheet as it copies the file to the target directory.
sentences.chinese: 當它將文件複製到目標目錄時，它會應用樣式表。

sentences.english: You have a few options for editing the button style.
sentences.chinese: 在編輯按鈕樣式時，有幾個選項供您選擇。

sentences.english: It also comes jam-packed with premade code snippets for common CSS styles.
sentences.chinese: 它還附帶果醬與常見的CSS樣式代碼段預製包裝。

sentences.english: Note how clunky this pull style sheet is.
sentences.chinese: 請注意這個拉樣式表多麼臃腫。

sentences.english: There are websites that trade specifically in baby clothing, including colorful baby clothes.
sentences.chinese: 一些網站會專門經營童裝，包括色彩豐富的樣式。

sentences.english: In this example, we show two useful styles.
sentences.chinese: 在本例中，我們說明兩種有用的樣式。

sentences.english: We have described how to use style classes in the above examples. This is a little tricker.
sentences.chinese: 在上述的例子中，我們已經描述了怎樣使用樣式級別。

definition: exterior appearance/to view sth from the outside/exterior condition
line (in drawing, calligraphy etc)/the lines or contours of a three-dimensional object (hairstyle, clothing, car etc)
